overview: Addy Kleijngeld was a musical genius. But also a well-known producer and the discoverer of Hein Simons and the Scorpions from England. The documentary shows images of old Helmond, his father's café Limburgia and the AK accordion orchestra he founded, for which he always came to rehearsals. Addy Kleijngeld was born on December 29, 1922 in Helmond and died of cardiac arrest at the age of only 54.
title: Addy Kleijngeld – accordeonvirtuoos
